problem_text_cn: 如图,在周长为18cm的▱ABCD中,AB≠AD,AC、BD相交于点O,OE⊥BD于E,则△ABE的周长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD with a perimeter of N_0, AB≠AD, AC and BD intersect at point O, and OE ⊥ BD at E, then the perimeter of △ABE is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵平行四边形ABCD,∴AD=BC,AB=CD,OB=OD,∵OE⊥BD,∴BE=DE,∵平行四边形ABCD的周长是18cm,∴2AB+2AD=18cm,∴AB+AD=9cm,∴△ABE的周长是AB+AE+BE=AB+AE+DE=AB+AD=9cm,故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了线段垂直平分线性质和平行四边形的性质的应用,关键是求出AD+AB的长和求出△ABE的周长=AB+AD,题目具有一定的代表性,难度也不大,是一道比较好的题目．
